about_the_game:
Our heroes are finally taking their well-deserved vacation to a chic tropical paradise! But alas, a major earthquake interrupts their vacation before it even starts and turns a secluded tourism destination into an isolated disaster area. Once again, Stephen Shepard leads a Emergency crew to help people in an hour needs and understand what is happening.From the airport to the snow-capped mountains, they will walk this path together and help everyone who is in trouble.The heroes will not stop at obstacles and will go to the end to save every single one.Who knows, maybe after all this ... Will they still be able to enjoy the pleasures of vacation normally?

Embark on a heroic journey to different parts of the world and save people! Remember - time is precious! Go to the very center of the island and reconnect with the rest of the world!

Functional controls and understandable instructions will help you easily understand the basics of the game.
"Emergency Crew 3" - save people from disaster!

- Natural disasters - earthquakes, floodings, fires!
- Team of professionals: rescuers, firefighters, paramedics, police officers, rangers!
- Unique special equipment: emergency vehicles, boats and helicopters.
- Thoughtful plot, colorful comics and characters, each with its own mood!
- Production chains capable of producing the highly advanced resources!
- A number of various tasks.
- 50 unique levels.
- 5 rescue operation locations are waiting for you: airport, tourist city, amusement park, wild jungle and snow-capped mountains.
- Pleasant theme-based music.
